question:
Which of the following are the different Verticals of NITI Aayog that provide the requisite coordination and support framework for NITI Aayog to carry out its mandate?
1. Agriculture
2. Data Management & Analysis
3. Health
4. Human Resource Development
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Some of the Verticals of NITI Aayog that provide the requisite coordination and support framework for NITI Aayog to carry out its mandate are: (1) Agriculture, (2) Data Management & Analysis, (3) Health, (4) Human Resource Development etc.
